articles.title: U.S Report: 305,000 Nigerians are refugees - The Nation Newspaper
articles.description: An American State Department report has put the number of Nigerian refugees in other countries at approximately 305,000
articles.content:
By Tony Akowe, Abuja
An American State Department report has put the number of Nigerian refugees in other countries at approximately 305,000 with over 2.1 million in Internally Displaced Persons (ID… [+2054 chars]

articles.author: Matthew Knott
articles.title: ‘Stop demonising China’: US-China stuck in ‘stalemate’ after talks - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Chinese officials told their US counterparts they believed America was waging “a whole-of-society campaign” to bring down China during the high-level talks.
articles.content: Washington: High-level talks between the United States and China have ended acrimoniously, with Chinese officials telling their counterparts to stop demonising the rising superpower as the Biden admi… [+1453 chars]
